title: Documentation 404 link
description:
Hello,

On the web site at this adress : https://lucene.apache.org/solr/guide/6_6/update-request-processors.html#UpdateRequestProcessors-GeneralUseUpdateProcessorFactories

The link : AtomicUpdateProcessorFactory

is bad.

Replace to : https://lucene.apache.org/solr/6_6_1/solr-core/org/apache/solr/update/processor/AtomicUpdateProcessorFactory.html

comments.content: This is fixed for the 7.3 version of the Ref Guide, which will be published soon, when 7.3 is released. It didn't have a JIRA, it came up in other review.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett
